function.name: book_appointment
function.description: Book a dental appointment for a patient. Call this when the patient wants to schedule an appointment and you have collected their name, preferred date, and time.

patient_phone.description: The patient's phone number for contact

appointment_date.description: The date for the appointment (e.g., '2025-02-10', 'tomorrow', 'next Monday')

appointment_time.description: The time for the appointment (e.g., '10:00 AM', '2:30 PM')

reason_for_visit.description: The reason for the dental visit (e.g., 'cleaning', 'checkup', 'toothache')

function.name: check_availability
function.description: Check available appointment slots for a specific date. Call this when the patient asks what times are available.

date.description: The date to check availability for (e.g., '2025-02-10', 'tomorrow')

function.name: cancel_appointment
function.description: Cancel an existing appointment. Call this when the patient wants to cancel their appointment.

appointment_id.description: The appointment ID to cancel (if known)

patient_phone.description: The patient's phone number to look up their appointment
